overview: When it comes to love, bookworm, Elle just can't get a break. She's always falling for men that are more interested in her sister. But, after watching her identical twin sister, Kayla steals her infatuation right out from under her fingers - Elle decides it's time to take romance into her own hands. Setting her sights on Kayla's strapping boyfriend, Jason, Elle decides to seduce him away from her sister by - pretending to be her. The plan works better than she hoped and the two forge both an emotional and physical connection, but Elle's plan quickly implode when Kayla discovers Elle's dirty secret. Will Elle never find lasting love - or is pretending to be someone else the only answer?
title: Two of a Kind
